name: Bird Mania 3D
synopsis: When Mojo realizes his friends from the flock set out to Africa he begins a frantic chase after them because he wants to go on a vacation too! Fly faster and faster, dash, soar, glide, and collect all of the bonuses. How far can you get in pursuit of a delightful vacation? Bird Mania 3D is a skill-based action game where you steer a little birdie on his way to Africa. Keep him out of trouble as long as possible and beat your best score! You will be hypnotized for long hours while trying to collect all of the bonuses and avoid the obstacles. And if you really want to perfect the art of flying, try to get all of the achievements.
